Since we have many modules in the project, I generally encourage consistency to make things more readable and maintainable. If something can be improved, then I would do it across the board. In this particular case, I would go with the existing approach, however flawed.
Even though we might be missing some tests, I believe it should still be possible to test the existing approach.
